transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan sir, good evening.
Executive: Good evening.
Customer: Salim sir bol rahe hain na?
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Haan Salim ji, Praveen bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Aapne ek request dali thi call back ke liye sir, bataye kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Mera manager se baat kijiye na.
Executive: Manager se, kyun se?
Customer: Number bolu?
Executive: Haan number bataiye.
Customer: Ek second.
Customer: Ye 7079276298?
Executive: Haan, haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Inka naam kya hai sir?
Customer: Kumar.
Executive: Achha Kumar kya naam hai aage?
Customer: Hussain.
Executive: Achha Kumar, Kumar Hussain na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir, K q likhte hain ki K likhte hain?
Customer: Q.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Kumar. 7079276298.
Executive: Achha, to ye, ye to wo hai sir, matlab account, matlab aapka account dekhte hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Unse baat kijiye.
Executive: Aap kya, aap owner hain?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Achha. Sir unse to baat hoti hai, sir thoda sa ye bhi puchna tha ki sir iska kya TrustSeal mein kyun nahi karwa rahe hain sir?
Customer: Wahi to dikkat hai, customer phone kar raha hai aur puch raha hai, rate puch raha hai, bas bhag raha hai.
Executive: Achha. Sir ye cheez dekho sir ko bhi pata hai kyunki wo IndiaMART mein kaam kar chuke hain, aapko bhi I think pata hoga. To maine unko sir cheeze yahi batai hai ki jo potential buyer hote hain na, jo customer bulk wali leads wale hote hain.
Executive: Jo potential buyer hain, wo aapki profile tak West Bengal mein pahunch nahi paate hain, connect nahi kar paate hain sir, ye sabse bada main reason hai.
Executive: Kyunki sir dekho aap.
Customer: Is saal ka, is saal ka mera business kahan hua hai? Ek bhi customer aaya is saal mein?
Executive: Sir, is saal ka aap keh rahe ho business nahi hai, haan.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapke hi area se Jai Balaji Timber Products ko jaante honge aap na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap vishwas nahi manoge inke paas na bahut IndiaMART ke TrustSeal verified member hain.
Customer: Achha theek hai main aapko thodi der baad call back kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Thodi der baad call back kar raha hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to talk to his manager.

Resolution:

- Executive asked for manager's contact number.
- Explained benefits of TrustSeal.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back later.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, buyleads, account manager
